text: 9.22 Mat 16.21, 17.22, Mak 8.31, 9.31, Luk 9.44, 18.32-33 Anɨb agɨl takaw olap pen agak, Bɨ Olap Ñɨne nop yul awl yɨbɨl ñɨnɨgabal agak. Bɨ Juda bɨawl takaw tɨg asɨkep okok, bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl okok, bɨ kɨli Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨgtep gep okok, kɨli nop ma dɨnɨgabal agak. Mɨlɨk nɨŋɨd, ñaglɨnɨgabal ak pen, ñɨn omɨŋal nokom mɨdɨl, tepayaŋ tɨkjakɨnɨgab agak.
